text: Vanguard was an American Thoroughbred racehorse. Ridden by Tom Costello, he won the 1882 Preakness Stakes. ==References== Category:Thoroughbred family 4-r Category:Racehorses bred in Kentucky Category:Racehorses trained in the United States Category:1879 racehorse births Category:Preakness Stakes winners Category:Byerley Turk sire line
title: Vanguard (American racehorse)
